rules.title: beginning and end
rules.description: infer that a TemporalEntity begins before it ends
rules.rule: time:TemporalEntity(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), greaterThan(?t1, ?t2) -> owl:Nothing(?a)

rules.title: before and after
rules.description: infer that two TemporalEntities are before and after one another
rules.rule: time:hasEnd(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), lessThan(?t1, ?t2) -> time:before(?a, ?b)

rules.title: Instant
rules.description: infer that a TemporalEntity is an Instant (i.e. has the same beginning and end)
rules.rule: time:TemporalEntity(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), equal(?t1, ?t2) -> time:Instant(?a), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?a, ?t1)

rules.title: ProperInterval
rules.description: infer that a TemporalEntity is a ProperInterval (i.e. has a different beginning and end)
rules.rule: time:TemporalEntity(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), lessThan(?t1, ?t2) -> time:ProperInterval(?a)

rules.title: interval before
rules.description: infer that two ProperIntervals are before and after one another
rules.rule: time:ProperInterval(?a), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:ProperInterval(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), lessThan(?t1, ?t2) -> time:intervalBefore(?a, ?b)

rules.title: interval equals
rules.description: infer that two ProperIntervals are equal
rules.rule: time:ProperInterval(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), time:ProperInterval(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i3), time:Instant(?i3), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i3, ?t3), time:hasEnd(?b, ?i4), time:Instant(?i4), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i4, ?t4), equal(?t1, ?t3), equal(?t2, ?t4) -> time:intervalEquals(?a, ?b)

rules.title: interval overlaps
rules.rule: time:ProperInterval(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), time:ProperInterval(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i3), time:Instant(?i3), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i3, ?t3), time:hasEnd(?b, ?i4), time:Instant(?i4), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i4, ?t4), lessThan(?t1, ?t3), lessThan(?t2, ?t4), greaterThan(?t2, ?t3) -> time:intervalOverlaps(?a, ?b)

rules.title: interval meets
rules.rule: time:ProperInterval(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), time:ProperInterval(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i3), time:Instant(?i3), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i3, ?t3), time:hasEnd(?b, ?i4), time:Instant(?i4), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i4, ?t4), equal(?t2, ?t3) -> time:intervalMeets(?a, ?b)

rules.title: interval during
rules.description: infer that a ProperInterval is during another
rules.rule: time:ProperInterval(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), time:ProperInterval(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i3), time:Instant(?i3), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i3, ?t3), time:hasEnd(?b, ?i4), time:Instant(?i4), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i4, ?t4), greaterThan(?t1, ?t3), lessThan(?t2, ?t4) -> time:intervalDuring(?a, ?b)

rules.title: interval starts
rules.description: infer that a ProperInterval starts another
rules.rule: time:ProperInterval(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), time:ProperInterval(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i3), time:Instant(?i3), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i3, ?t3), time:hasEnd(?b, ?i4), time:Instant(?i4), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i4, ?t4), equal(?t1, ?t3), lessThan(?t2, ?t4) -> time:intervalStarts(?a, ?b)

rules.title: interval finishes
rules.description: infer that a ProperInterval starts another
rules.rule: time:ProperInterval(?a), time:hasBeginning(?a, ?i1), time:Instant(?i1), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i1, ?t1), time:hasEnd(?a, ?i2), time:Instant(?i2), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i2, ?t2), time:ProperInterval(?b), time:hasBeginning(?b, ?i3), time:Instant(?i3), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i3, ?t3), time:hasEnd(?b, ?i4), time:Instant(?i4), time:inXSDDateTimeStamp(?i4, ?t4), equal(?t2, ?t4), greaterThan(?t1, ?t3) -> time:intervalFinishes(?a, ?b)
